description: The lovely and voluptuous Lucia Love is back for more pain and humiliation. Antonio Ross and Nikki Thorne start by taking Lucia outside for a walk by leash and cuffs completely nude, only stopping occasionally for a flogging. Later they meet Steve Holmes at a club, and an all out fuckfest breaks out. Steve and Antonio both take turns fucking and tormenting Lucia and Nikki Thorne gets so turned on she fucks all three of them.
title: Hungary for Lucia Love
